document: <sentence id="s1" text="Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (PNH) is a clonal hematopoietic disease caused by expansion of a stem cell that harbors a somatic mutation in li>GPI anchor biosynthetic process PIGA mutant blood cells are deficient in the complement regulator proteins CD55 and CD59, making them susceptible to intravascular hemolysis due to a failure to regulate the cellular response to DNA damage stimulus on erythrocytes.">
